// Export an array of all the schema types.  This is used in the Sanity Studio configuration. https://www.sanity.io/docs/schema-types
export const schemaTypes = [
  // Singletons
  settings,
  // Documents
  page,
  post,
  person,
  // Objects
  blockContent,
  infoSection,
  callToAction,
  link,
]
